alert.note: Alert for Box Butte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Box Butte County through 1245 AM MDT... At 1215 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wild Horse Butte to 8 miles east of Kilpatrick Lake. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Hemingford, Wild Horse Butte, Berea and Alliance Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
